titleStmt.title: Dr. Franciscus de le Boe Sylvius Of childrens diseases given in a familiar style for weaker capacities. With an apparatus or introduction explaining the authors principles: as also a treatise of the rickets. By R. G. physician.
titleStmt.author: Le Boë, Frans de, 1614-1672.

titleStmt.title: Dr. Franciscus de le Boe Sylvius Of childrens diseases given in a familiar style for weaker capacities. With an apparatus or introduction explaining the authors principles: as also a treatise of the rickets. By R. G. physician.
titleStmt.author: Le Boë, Frans de, 1614-1672.
R. G. (Richard Gower). aui

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Downs at the Three Flower de Luces in Fleet-street, over against St. Dunstan's Church,

notesStmt.note: "The apparatus", a technical introduction on medicine, signed: Richard Gower, who was also translator and author of the marginal notes.
A translation; original title not traced.
Copy tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
